body_html:
Looks like a missing functionality. @ispirmustafa -- is there any plan to allow configuring Session options for session used in estimator?

As a work-around, you could monkey-patch Session.__init__ method to add XLA config, something like this

oldinit = tf.Session.__init__
def myinit(session_object, target='', graph=None, config=None):
    print("Intercepted!")
    optimizer_options = tf.OptimizerOptions()
    optimizer_options.global_jit_level = tf.OptimizerOptions.ON_1
    config = tf.ConfigProto(graph_options=tf.GraphOptions(optimizer_options=optimizer_options))
    return oldinit(session_object, target, graph, config)
tf.Session.__init__ = myinit

body:
Looks like a missing functionality. @ispirmustafa -- is there any plan to allow configuring Session options for session used in estimator?

As a work-around, you could monkey-patch `Session.__init__` method to add XLA config, something like this

```
oldinit = tf.Session.__init__
def myinit(session_object, target='', graph=None, config=None):
    print("Intercepted!")
    optimizer_options = tf.OptimizerOptions()
    optimizer_options.global_jit_level = tf.OptimizerOptions.ON_1
    config = tf.ConfigProto(graph_options=tf.GraphOptions(optimizer_options=optimizer_options))
    return oldinit(session_object, target, graph, config)
tf.Session.__init__ = myinit
```
